LanguageData.Expedition33.label: Expedition 33
LanguageData.Expedition33.description: A military faction whose members are haunted by a mysterious phenomenon called "The Gommage".
LanguageData.GestralTribe.label: Gestral Tribe
LanguageData.GestralTribe.description: A tribe of friendly but simple-minded Gestrals who love to fight. They respect powerful warriors and aren't afraid of death thanks to their rebirth ability at the Sacred River.
LanguageData.Nevrons.label: Gommage Forces
LanguageData.Nevrons.description: A corrupted faction mixing bestial creatures and humans fallen to the Paintress. These once-living entities were transformed by the Gommage, losing their humanity but retaining terrifying collective intelligence. They emerge from the depths to spread their corruption.
